cards.title: Acid Arrow
cards.description: Hail of Thorns: Shoot a green arrow at a target, dealing 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 at the end of its next turn on hit. On miss, target takes half initial damage with no damage after.

cards.title: Acid Splash
cards.description: Hurl acid bubble at one creature or two within 5 ft. Targets make Dex save or take 1d6 acid damage. Damage increases at 5th (2d6), 11th (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

cards.title: Aid
cards.description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

cards.title: Alarm
cards.description: Alarm spell creates a 20-foot ward on a door, window, or area. Alerts you mentally within 1 mile or audibly within 60 feet if a creature enters, except those you specify. Lasts until dismissed.

cards.title: Alter Self
cards.description: Alter Self spell: Choose aquatic adaptation for underwater breathing and swimming, change appearance to disguise yourself, or gain natural weapons for 1d6 damage with a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls for unarmed strikes.

cards.title: Animal Friendship
cards.description: Calm emotions of a beast by convincing it you mean no harm. Target must see and hear you, with Intelligence below 4. If the beast fails a Wisdom save, it's charmed until harmed by you or your allies.

cards.title: Animal Messenger
cards.description: Use a Tiny beast to send a message to a specified location and recipient. The beast travels towards the target, delivering a 25-word message in your voice, then returns if it doesn't reach the destination before the spell ends.

cards.title: Animal Shapes
cards.description: Polymorph spell transforms willing creatures into beasts CR 4 or lower, lasting until dispelled or target drops to 0 HP. Stats and HP change, gear melds into new form, and creature can't speak, cast spells, or use equipment.

cards.title: Animate Dead
cards.description: Animate Dead creates a skeleton or zombie from corpse or bones. Control undead within 60 feet as a bonus action, issuing commands or setting general tasks. Control lasts 24 hours; reassert by recasting before time ends for up to four creatures.

cards.title: Animate Objects
cards.description: Animate objects, up to ten nonmagical objects become creatures under your control until spell ends or reduced to 0 HP. Command them mentally within 500 feet, each size category has specific stats for HP, AC, and attacks.
